mission.headline: We don't leave our friends alone.
mission.description:
The "One Bowl of Food, One Bowl of Water" movement has started!
We believe we can make a big difference with a small touch for our street friends. As PetMedia, we encourage everyone to support our animal friends by placing a bowl of food and a bowl of water in front of their house.
A small bowl, a big kindness!
